text: Livingston is a town in the Scottish county of West Lothian. It is home to the Scottish Premiership football club Livingston F.C. The Livingston Centre and Livingston Outlet host a wide range of shops, restaurants and cafes, as well as a cinema and adventure golf. Deer Park country club has a swimming pool, golf course, and bowling. Category:Towns in West Lothian
title: Livingston
